station.name: Hit 96.7 FM Malayalam
station.longDesc: Owned and operated by Arabian Radio Network, Hit 96.7 FM is a radio broadcaster based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. It was established in 2004 aiming to inform and entertain the Malayalam community.

station.name: Kerala Radio Malayalam
